DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_GP_SUSPECT_1
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT B.NOME SUBFASE,COUNT(A.HANDLE) QTDE
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS A
JOIN K_CRM_SUBFASES B ON A.SUBFASE = B.HANDLE
WHERE A.FASE = 1 AND A.SUBFASE <> 2
GROUP BY B.NOME
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="SUBFASE" From="A" Path="SUBFASE" /> <Field Alias="QTDE" From="A" Path="QTDE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
